items.content_html: Silent C2 is a simple, lightweight command-and-control (C2) server designed for use in small-scale projects or as a starting point for larger C2 projects. It's written in Golang & MySQL for its database. Silent C2 is designed to be easy to set up and use, while providing a good foundation for more complex C2 systems.
items.title: ItsEcstasy/SilentC2: Silent C2 is a simple, lightweight command-and-control (C2) server designed for use in small-scale projects or as a starting point for larger C2 projects.  It's written in Golang & MySQL for its database. Silent C2 is designed to be easy to set up and use, while providing a good foundation for more complex C2 systems.
